Room.Name: Mausoleum
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a giant, secret tomb.
Room.LongDescription: The door has shut as you walked in. The only way out is to find the right key. In the center of the dark room, you see a large marble sarcophagus. It's about nine feet long and two feet wide, decorated in an ornate elven style. The inscription reads: "Here lies Dabin, Founder of the Great City of Caledonia".
